item.title: Example Page
R Markdown Page
item.description: true This page provides an example of using R Markdown. x <- 1:10 y <- round(rnorm(10, x, 1), 2) df <- data.frame(x, y) df ## x y ## 1 1 0.27 ## 2 2 2.44 ## 3 3 3.21 ## 4 4 4.45 ## 5 5 4.35 ## 6 6 6.03 ## 7 7 8.64 ## 8 8 8.55 ## 9 9 9.22 ## 10 10 9.29
